== What do you mean by: What I think I know about scalability is wrong?!!? ==
If you think that 6 milliseconds to iterate a collection will be fine for your application, then unfortunately it's true. Your application will die, and it won't be graceful.

This question is best answered with another question:
*What is the average latency for a queue of 10 requests where each request takes 10ms to process?*

Here is a nice diagram:
[http://cqengine.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/latency-in-a queue.png]
